In a town where the currency is compliments, the richest citizen is a goldfish who can't hear them. This is not a metaphor. Commander Bubbles is literally a goldfish.
She founded Tiny Paws Academy in 2019 ‚Äî a kindergarten for retired supervillains ‚Äî from inside a bowl on the reception desk. She has never left the bowl. The bowl has never left the desk.
I, Sergeant Whiskers, am her campaign manager. I am a cat. I graduated from the program. My villain name was The Shredder. I shredded curtains. I have reformed.
Bubbles cannot speak, read, or understand the concept of municipal governance. She is, however, extremely confident. She swims in circles. Counterclockwise. Always counterclockwise. We interpret this as policy.

The Purrlatform

Seven promises. Seven lives remaining.
Promise I
Mandatory 3pm nap for all citizens
Studies show that 97% of supervillain relapses occur between 2:45pm and 3:15pm. The Shredder Incident (my incident) happened at 3:02pm. Naps save curtains.
Promise II
Replace all stop signs with gentle suggestions
"Stop" is triggering for reformed villains. New signs will read: "Paws here, if you'd like. You're doing great."
Promise III
Minimum compliment wage: 14 compliments/hour
No citizen should work a full shift and go home without hearing "nice whiskers" at least once.
Promise IV
Free cardboard boxes on every street corner
Fur sitting in. Fur hiding in. Fur the economy. Box-based GDP is projected to rise 340%.
Promise V
Rename City Hall to "City Tall Cat Tree"
It will have seven levels. Each level is a different napping platform. Legislation happens on level four. Level seven is vibes only.
Promise VI
All laser pointers registered and regulated
Three of our graduates relapsed directly because of unregistered laser pointers. Dr. Destructor chased one into a Trader Joe's. He knocked over the sample station. We don't talk about it.
Promise VII
Commander Bubbles will continue swimming counterclockwise
This is not a promise. This is what she does. We are listing it because we need seven and she won't stop.

Current Exchange Rates ‚Äî Meownomics Bureau

Under Commander Bubbles, Aqua Vista will transition fully to the compliment standard. All transactions will be conducted in sincere, specific praise. Vague compliments ("nice job") are worth 40% less than targeted ones ("your calico pattern really catches the afternoon light").
